> <OLD - DINOBOT>
>
> DINOBOT took the time over to unleash his heavy power drill, going to charge
> over inot the midst of the SHARKTICONS.  They might be dangerous over in
> numbers, but individually they were not threats.  HOwever, thanks to the
> drilling, with luck he might ISOLATE small pockets of them to eliminate
> groupings cluster by cluster.  Ignoring the brawling leaders for now - that
> was the battle of the leaders, not his mission.
>
> What injuries he would take would hopefully be minor, and his superior skill
> would allow him to take on pockets of sharkticons one at a time!

> <OLD - DINOBOT AND VICEGRIP>
>
> But at this point, DINOBOT was intercepted then by the charging SHARKTICON,
> and his response oer was qutie brutal!  Metallidiko taught to do the most
> powerful blow when your enemy could not resist it, so his large tail cannon
> swung around on his arm then to try and blast it over at point blank range
> in the faceplate!
>
> Meanwhile, VICE GRIP just went to transform now back to his robot mode,
> attempting to use his superior strength to try and pickl up one SHARKTICOn
> and then toss it over at the rest like a bowling ball!

DINOBOT was having a powerful affect on the SHARKTICON he was facing.
While they were better trained the the SHARKTICONS of old, they were
still no match for his martial arts moves as several of them fell to
DINOBOT'S bliningly fast moves!

The same thing was happening with VICE GRIP! Picking up one he was
able to send that hapless SHARKTICON sailing into several of his
companions, all of them landing on the ground in a heap!

Up ahead SKYSHADOW and his FUZORS were up ahead cutting a wide swath
into the SHARKTICONS as well. Thier ferocious attcks eating quickly
into their numbers.

However the battle was not over as still more SHARKTICONS were
streaming over to them led by their leader SKYBYTE, who like most
proud DECEPTICOn and PREDACON generals were was leading from the back!

"Attack my prcious armies, attack!" He whooped in delight pushing the
SHARKTICONS forward!

> <OLD - NIGHTLIGHT>
>
> "NO!... STAY AWAY OFF ME!!!" Said the femm while she weakly stuggle creating enoguh
> noise to be notice, she acummulated all the enrgy that she could and shoot a enrgy ball
> at Saberback's chest.

<NEW>

SABERBACK seemed more surprised by NIGHTLIGHT's attack then truly hurt
by it, although it did cause him to back up a few steps as the
explosion went off.

> <OLD - STRAIGHT SHOT>
>
> Straight Shot turns her head quickly in Nightlight's direction and quickly
> bounds over to her as quickly as she can.  While kicking up some dust, at a
> sharp halt, she releases a barrage of explosive quills in Saberback's
> direction in attempts to back Nightlight up.
>
> "HEY, UGLY!  EVER FEEL STUCK AT YOUR JOB?!"

<NEW>

Several quills sink deep into SABERBACK and he hissed in pain. Pulling
out his cannon he pointed it at NIGHTLIGHT as the small wine of a full
charge could be heard, "Try that again and it will be this Maximal of
yours that will pay the penalty!"

Meanwhile two soldiers were rushing towards STRAIGHT SHOT, they looked
somehting like DINOBOTS but with signifigantly less armor. Thier
weapons were out and facing STRAIGHT SHOT as they pounded forward.

> <OLD - TUSCON>
>
>   As Tucson rears up to bravely face Magmatron, he returns to robot mode
> .  With a brave face, he stands firm and ready to take on his challenger.
> Yet while he does so he casually shifts a foot across the ground and
> dislodges a fairly good sized stone of diamond like volcanic rock.  He
> crouches down to pick it up.  Slowly Tucson rises to his feet.  He playfully
> handles the stone for a moment or so.
>
> " Size isn't everything, Magmatron.  Sometimes the most successful warriors
> are no bigger than I am.  Yet you may not understand what I'm telling you
> because these were the words of Yoketron.  And I'm not about to divulge any
> of his secrets to the likes of you."
>
> He turns away for a moment, as if not about to do anything.  He takes a step
> back but then, he takes a running start, and a quick leap in the air
> followed by a very quick toss of the stone in an attempt to strike Magmatron
> in one of his eyes!
>
> The stone flies at bullet speed.

The stone sailed gracefully through the air, twisting and turning. It
rose in a powerful arc, only to be pulled down by the force of gravity
and the unerring aim of TUSCON. With a snap it hit MAGMATRON right
between the optics causing the large mech to step back a pace or two!

"A rock?" He said as he felt his head as if half expecting something
of far more danger and yet finding none. "Is that all you have?"

He smiled darkly as he looked at TUSCON and then LEO and BIG CONVOY as
they all stood before him. "Ahh, then it comes down to this then, the
three of you?"

He chuckled darkly as he wiped away the stone that had lodged itself
in his faceplate, it hit the ground and bounced away.

Meanwhile MAGMATRON assumed a martial arts pose of his own, gesturing
for them to come foward, "all of you!, come!" He gestured as he swung
his large sword and then assumed another pose of calm readiness. "It
is time to finish this!"

At the same time RODIMUS and DARK RODIMUS continued to fight!

- Kick - punch - block - spin kick, high kick - duck

The very air was full of the movements of the two, they were seemingly
a mirror image of each other, one of bright hot fire the other one of
the blackest of night - cold and deadly!

They fought each other RODIMUS and DARK RODIMUS, thier fight taking
them  towards OPTIMUS PRIME as the one time AUTOBOT leader lay hanging
by his hands over the pit.

(TAG)

- Preston
